Global Helpers¶

project.server.helpers.credentials_to_dict(credentials)[source]¶

Take the credentials and return it as a dict.

Parameters:credentials – a constructed credentials
Type:constructed credentials
Returns:a dict with the following keys: token, expiry, refresh, token_uri, client_id, client_secret, scopes
project.server.helpers.login_required(f)[source]¶

Make routes private, for logged_in user only. Check if the user is logged in, if True continue to the route. Else give a warning to log in first and redirect to the main route.

Parameters:f – The wrapped function
Type:function
